Summary: Round Grey disk just above low flying clouds. No noise light in the middle rotating in counter clockwise.
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside and seen a Grey disk shaped object not moving very fast or very slow, just kinda moving along. It seemed to have a light on the bottom that moved in a counter clockwise circle. It was just above some low flying clouds. Really couldn't see it real well because it was dark out. There wasn't any noise coming from it.
